name: Perfect Partner
description:
Best Partner is a game where two people work closely together to beat other teams to finally eat chicken! The game will be played in 3 random matches of different types, each match will eliminate the lowest scoring teams, in each match, you have to be careful of your enemies and your cute teammates, the first to throw you into the water may not know who will be.


You can have a martial arts summit duel



Or use your brain with your buddy, friend, to add within 10?



If you want to take it easy, a simple coloring is fine



Or play a game of mahjong with a buddy



Go on a shopping spree at the festival
